data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Moreirense with the kick-off.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Moreirense with the kick-off.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Benfica.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Benfica!
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Benfica's Rafa Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Andreas Samaris. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Moreirense push forward at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica and Bilel Aouacheria gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Benfica defence.
Fabio Abreu for Moreirense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Benfica a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Benfica's area.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Benfica pushes forward through Rafa Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
Moreirense drive upfield and Gabrielzinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benfica defender.
Gabrielzinho of Moreirense is pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Carlos Vinicius (Benfica) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Adel Taarabt for Benfica drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Benfica.
Moreirense's Joao Aurelio attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Free kick Benfica.
Pizzi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Benfica's Ferro is on target but unsuccessful.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica.
Benfica's Adel Taarabt breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Ruben Dias of Benfica gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Lisbon, Rafa Silva of Benfica is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Benfica are pushing forward but Rafa Silva's finish is wide of the goal.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Moreirense in Lisbon.
Throw-in Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabio Verissimo blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Lisbon - Benfica with the kick-off.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica.
Penalty! Fabio Verissimo points to the spot, great chance for Benfica...
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Pizzi. The finish is off target, however.
Pizzi for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Benfica are awarded a penalty ... Pizzi botches the spot kick!
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Moreirense's area.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Filipe Soares (Moreirense) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Moreirense.
Benfica's Andreas Samaris has been booked in Lisbon.
The match at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bilel Aouacheria, who is down injured.
Bilel Aouacheria returns to the field for Moreirense after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Pizzi (Benfica) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
The home team replace Julian Weigl with Dyego Sousa.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Dyego Sousa (Benfica) strikes at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Moreirense make their first substitution with Luis Machado replacing Gabrielzinho.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Moreirense take a 0-1 lead thanks to Fabio Abreu.
Abdu Conte instrumental with a fine assist.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Franco Cervi is on a sub for Rafa Silva for Benfica.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Benfica's Carlos Vinicius misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Benfica.
Jota is replacing Adel Taarabt for the home team.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
Fabio Verissimo waits before resuming play because Mateus Pasinato for Moreirense is still down.
Mateus Pasinato for Moreirense is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Free kick Moreirense.
Ricardo Soares (Moreirense) is making a second substitution, with Pedro Nuno replacing Bilel Aouacheria.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Moreirense's Pedro Nuno breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Benfica have a goal kick.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In Lisbon Benfica drive forward through Ferro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Moreirense's area.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Benfica.
Pizzi (Benfica) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In Lisbon, Dyego Sousa (Benfica) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Benfica are coming forward and Alex Grimaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fabio Verissimo awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Benfica's Pizzi gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Dyego Sousa (Benfica) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Pizzi (Benfica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Benfica's Alex Grimaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Lisbon. The final score is 1-1.
Mateus Pasinato is booked for the away team.
Pizzi grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Luis Machado for Moreirense has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
Steven Vitoria is replacing Alex Soares for the away team.
